(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:solution))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun solution (number)
  (loop for i from 2 below number
        if (or (= (rem i 3) 0)
               (= (rem i 5) 0))
        sum i))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:solution))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun solution (number)
  (let ((x (- number 1)))
    (cond 
      ((< x 3) 0)
      ((or (zerop (rem x 3)) (zerop (rem x 5))) (+ x (solution x)))
      (t (solution x)))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:solution))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun solution (number)
  (if (< number 0)
      0
      (loop :for i :from 1 :below number
            :when (or (= 0 (mod i 3))
                      (= 0 (mod i 5)))
            :sum i)))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:solution))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun solution (number)
  (loop for x from 0 below number if (or (= 0 (mod x 3)) (= 0 (mod x 5))) sum x))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:solution))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun solution (number)
  (apply #'+
         (loop for x from 1 to (1- number)
               if (three-or-five x)
                 collect (first (list x)))))

(defun three-or-five (number)
  (or (= 0 (mod number 3)) (= 0 (mod number 5))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:solution))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun solution (n)
  (let ((m 0))
    (loop for i from 1
          while (< i n)
          do (if (or (= 0 (mod i 3)) (= 0 (mod i 5)))
                 (setq m (+ m i))
             )
          )
    m))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:solution))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun solution (number)
  (loop for i from 1 to (1- number)
	      when (or (= (mod i 3) 0) (= (mod i 5) 0))
	      sum i))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:solution))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun solution (number)
  (loop :for i :from 3 :below number
        :when (or (= (mod i 3) 0) (= (mod i 5) 0))
        :sum i))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:solution))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun multiples-of-x-below-n (n x)
  (loop for i from 1 to (floor (/ (1- n) x))
	collect (* i x)))

(defun multiples-of-3-and-5-below-n (n)
  (reduce #'+
	  (delete-duplicates (append (multiples-of-x-below-n n 3)
				     (multiples-of-x-below-n n 5)))))

(defun solution (number)
  (multiples-of-3-and-5-below-n number))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:solution))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun mul-x<n (x n &optional (i 1) (lst nil))
  (if (>= (* x i) n)
      lst
      (mul-x<n x n (+ i 1) (nconc lst (list (* x i))))))

(defun solution (number)
  (reduce '+ (union (mul-x<n 3 number) (mul-x<n 5 number))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:greet))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun doit (acc n)
  (typecase acc
    (string (concatenate 'string acc (string (code-char n))))
    (t (concatenate 'string (string (code-char acc)) (string (code-char n))))))

(defun greet ()
  (reduce #'doit '(104 101 108 108 111 32 119 111 114 108 100 33)))

; Write a function `greet` that returns "hello world!"

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:greet))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

; Write a function `greet` that returns "hello world!"
(defun greet ()
  (concatenate 'string "hello" " " "world" "!")
)

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:decomp))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun decomp* (num cur)
  (cond
    ((= 1 num) ())
    ((= 0 (mod num cur)) (cons cur (decomp* (/ num cur) cur)))
    (t (decomp* num (1+ cur)))))

(defun decomp** (n)
  (let* ((a (loop for x from 2 to n
		 collect x))
	(b (apply #'append (mapcar (lambda (x) (decomp* x 2)) a))))
    
    b))

(defun klmnop (lst)
  (cond
    ((null lst) ())
    (t (cons (list (car lst) (count (car lst) lst))
	     (klmnop (remove (car lst) lst))))))

(defun style (lst)
  (mapcar (lambda (x) (if (= 1 (second x))
			  (write-to-string (first x))
			  (concatenate 'string (write-to-string (first x))
				       "^"
				       (write-to-string (second x)))))
	  lst))

(defun style-up (lst)
  (cond
    ((null (rest lst)) (car lst))
    (t (concatenate 'string (car lst)
		    " * "
		    (style-up (rest lst))))))

(defun decomp (n)
  (style-up (style (klmnop (decomp** n)))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:decomp))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun prime-decomp (x)
  (do* ((limit (isqrt x))
        (seen  (make-array (list limit) :element-type 'boolean :initial-element nil))
        (res   nil)
        (n     2 (1+ n)))
       ((> n x) res)
    (loop while (= 0 (mod x n))
          sum 1 into times
          do (setf x (floor x n))
          finally (when (> times 0)
                    (push (cons n times) res)))))

(defun merge-alists-into (xs ys)
  (loop for (b . e) in ys
        for cell = (assoc b xs)
        if cell
          do (incf (cdr cell) e)
        else do (setf (cdr xs) (cons (cons b e) (cdr xs)))))

(defun fact-decomp (x)
  (loop with full-decomp = (prime-decomp x)
        for i from (1- x) downto 2
        do (merge-alists-into full-decomp (prime-decomp i))
        finally (return full-decomp)))

(defun decomp (n)
  (with-output-to-string (s)
    (format s
            "狺"
            (mapcar (lambda (cell) (if (= 1 (cdr cell))
                                  (format nil "a" (car cell))
                                  (format nil "a^a" (car cell) (cdr cell))))
                    (sort (fact-decomp n) #'< :key #'car)))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:decomp))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun primes-to (n)
  (if (= n 2) '(2)
      (let* ((n1 (floor (/ n 2))) 
             (cache (make-array n1 :element-type 'boolean :initial-element t)))
        (loop for x from 0 to (1- n1)
              when (aref cache x)
              do (loop for y from (+ x x x 3) to (1- n1) by (+ x x 3)
                       do (setf (aref cache y) nil)))
        (cons 2 (loop for i from 0 to (/ (- n 3) 2) 
              when (aref cache i)
              collect (+ i i 3))))))

(defun decomp (n)
  (let* ((primes (primes-to n))
         (l (length primes))
         (col (make-array l :element-type 'integer :initial-element 0)))
    (loop for i from 2 to n do
          (loop for j from 0 below l
                with x = i
                do
                (when (= x 1) (return))
                (loop 
                  with c = (elt primes j)
                  do
                  (if (zerop (mod x c))
                      (progn (incf (aref col j))
                             (setf x (/ x c)))
                      (return)))))
    (format nil "狺埝箕夯撖邯狺蔺" 
            (loop for i from 0 below l
                  collect (list (elt primes i) (aref col i))))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:decomp))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun decomp (n)
	(print-factors (find-factors n)))

(defun find-factors (n)
	(remove-if #'null
						 (loop for p from 2 to n
									 when (is-prime-p p)
										 collect (list p (loop for m from p to n
																					 sum (count-primes m p))))))

(defun count-primes (n p)
	"Gets the number of times the factor p appears in n"
	(loop for c from 0 
				until (not (zerop (mod n p)))
				do (setf n (/ n p))
				finally (return c)))

(defun print-factors (factors)
	(format nil "濑埝箕夯邯撖濑蔺" factors))

(defun is-prime-p (n)
	;;test with 6k+1 check
	(when (or (= n 2) (= n 3))
		(return-from is-prime-p t))
	(when (or (zerop (mod n 2))
						(zerop (mod n 3)))
		(return-from is-prime-p nil))
	(loop for p from 5 by 6
				while (<= (* p p) n)
				when (or (zerop (mod n p))
								 (zerop (mod n (+ 2 p))))
					do (return-from is-prime-p nil))
	t)

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:decomp))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun primenum (n d)
  (if (= (mod n d) 0)
      (if (= n 2) t nil)
      (if (> (sqrt n) d)
          (primenum n (+ d 1))
          t)))

(defun factorshelper (i i2 n)
  (if (= (mod n i) 0)
      (+ 1 (factorshelper (* i i2) i2 n))
      0))

(defun factors (i n)
  (loop for j from 1 to n
        if (= (mod j i) 0)
          sum (factorshelper i i j) into results
        finally (return results)))

(defun factorformat (i n)
  (cond ((= n 0) nil)
        ((= n 1) (write-to-string i))
        (t (format nil "A^A" i n))))

(defun decomp (n)
  (format nil "窿"
    (loop for i from 2 to n
          if (and (primenum i 2))
            collect (factorformat i (factors i n)) into strs
          finally (return strs))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:decomp))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun decomp (n)
  (join
     (mapcar #'stringify-expt
             (loop with nums = (range 2 n)
                  for i in (primes-upto n)
                  collect (list i (loop for x in nums
                                        sum (count-multiples x i)))))))

(defun join (strs)
  "Given a list of strings, join with asterisks."
  (format nil "狺" strs))

(defun stringify-expt (lst)
  "Given a list of (base, expt) return a string of 'base^expt'.
  If the exponent is 1, just return the base"
  (if (= (second lst) 1)
      (format nil "a" (first lst))
      (format nil "狺揶" lst)))

(defun count-multiples (n fac)
  "Return the number of times fac divides n evenly."
  (loop for base = n then (/ base fac)
        while (zerop (rem base fac))
        count 1))

(defun primes-upto (n)
  "Return all prime numbers below n."
  (loop for fac from 2 to n
        when (notany (lambda (i) (zerop (mod fac i))) factors)
        collect fac into factors
        finally (return factors)))

(defun range (start end)
  (loop for i from start to end collect i))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:decomp))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)


(defun small-primes-less-than (n)
  (labels ((rec (known-primes candidate-primes)
             (if (null candidate-primes)
                 known-primes
                 (let ((candidate-prime (car candidate-primes)))
                   (if (notany #'(lambda (x) (zerop (mod candidate-prime x))) known-primes) ; The candidate isn't divisible by any known prime.
                       (rec (append known-primes (list candidate-prime)) (cdr candidate-primes)) ; Add the largest prime to the end of the list of primes.
                       (rec known-primes (cdr candidate-primes))))))) ; Or go on to the next candidate. 
    (rec '(2) (loop for i from 3 upto n collect i))))


(defun factorial (n)
  "Doing an iteractive factorial feels ... wrong..."
  (if (= n 0)
      1
      (apply #'* (loop for i from 1 upto n collect i))))


(defun decomp (n)
  (labels ((factors-powers-alists ()   ; for each number less than or equal to n, produce an alist containing prime-power cons pairs
             (let ((primes (small-primes-less-than n)))
               (loop for k from 1 upto n collect (loop for p in primes collect (prime-dot-product k p)))))
           (combine-factors-powers-alists (alists) ; "add" together all of the prime factors (multiply by summing the powers of the primes)
             (let ((factors (make-array (1+ n) :initial-element 0)))
               (loop for alist in alists do (loop for pare in alist do (incf (aref factors (car pare)) (cdr pare))))
               (loop for i upto n unless (zerop (aref factors i)) collect (cons i (aref factors i)))))
           (prime-dot-product (m p) ; If m is divisible by p^a, returns (p . a)
             (cond ((not (zerop (mod m p))) (cons p 0))
                   ((not (zerop (mod (/ m p) p))) (cons p 1))
                   (t (cons p (1+ (cdr  (prime-dot-product (/ m p) p)))))))
           (format-base-power (alist-element)  ; Turns (p . a) into "p^a" or "p" as appropriate.
             (cond ((zerop (cdr alist-element)) nil)
                   ((= 1 (cdr alist-element)) (format nil "A" (car alist-element)))
                   (t (format nil "A^A" (car alist-element) (cdr alist-element))))))
    (let* ((prime-decomposition (combine-factors-powers-alists (factors-powers-alists))) ; Do the prime decomposition of the factorial.
           (factor-strings (loop for pair in prime-decomposition collect (format-base-power pair)))) ; Express each prime factor-power pair as a string.
      (format nil "窿蕺" factor-strings)))) ; Join the strings to create the final answer.

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:decomp))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun max-power.factor (exp n)
  (cond ((= exp n) (cons 1 0))
        ((= (rem n exp) 0) (let* ((mp.f (max-power.factor exp (/ n exp)))
                                  (mp (car mp.f))
                                  (f (cdr mp.f)))
                              (cons (+ mp 1) f)))
        (T (cons 0 n))))

(defun factorized (ns)
  (if (null ns)
      ns
      (let* ((n (car ns))
             (p.fs (mapcar #'(lambda (x) (max-power.factor n x)) ns))
             (ps (mapcar #'car p.fs))
             (p-sum (reduce #'+ ps))
             (fs (remove-if-not #'(lambda (x) (> x 0)) (mapcar #'cdr p.fs))))
            (cons (cons n p-sum) (factorized fs)))))
  
(defun f.p2str (f.p)
  (let* ((f (car f.p)) (p (cdr f.p))
         (f-str (format nil "A" f))
         (p-str (if (> p 1)
                    (concatenate 'string "^" (format nil "A" p))
                    "")))
        (concatenate 'string f-str p-str)))

(defun range (s e) (loop for n from s to e collect n))

(defun decomp (n)
  (let* ((factors (range 2 n))
         (fact.pows (factorized factors))
         (fp-strs (mapcar #'f.p2str fact.pows)))
        (format nil "窿" fp-strs)))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:decomp))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun is-prime (n)
  (or (= n 2)
      (loop for i from 2 to (isqrt n)
            never (zerop (rem n i)))))

(defun find-exp (n p)
  (if (zerop (rem n p)) 
      (1+ (find-exp (/ n p) p))
      0))

(defun find-exp-fact (n p)
  (loop for i from p to n
        sum (find-exp i p) into e
        finally (return e)))

(defun decomp (n)
  (let ((v
    (loop for p from 2 to n
          when (is-prime p)
          collect (let ((e (find-exp-fact n p)))
                       (if (> e 1)
                           (format nil "d^d" p e)
                           (format nil "d" p))))))
    (format nil "窿" v))
)

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:cycli))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun cycli (n)
  (setq res 1)
  (setq shifted 1)
  (defun shift () (setq shifted (mod (* shifted 10) n)))
  (if (not (= 1 (gcd n 10))) 
      (setq res -1)
      (loop until (= 1 (shift)) do (incf res))
  )
  res
)

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:cycli))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun coprime-10-p (n)
  (or (= 0 (mod n 2))
      (= 0 (mod n 5))))

(defun cycli (n)
  (if (coprime-10-p n)
      -1
      (loop :for i :from 1
            :with initial-modulus := (mod 10 n)
            :for current := initial-modulus :then (mod (* current initial-modulus) n)
            :when (= 1 current)
            :return i)))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:cycli))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun check-coprime-with-10 (num)
  (if (or (= 0 (mod num 2))
	  (= 0 (mod num 5))
	  (= 0 (mod num 10)))
      nil
      t))

(defun get-digits-after-coma (num div flag cur)
  (cond
    ((and (= 1 div) flag) cur)
    (t (get-digits-after-coma num (mod (* 10 div) num) t (1+ cur)))))



(defun cycli (n)
    (cond
      ((= n 1) nil)

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:solve))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(setq *read-default-float-format* 'double-float)

(defun solve (m)
  (defun u (m x)
    (do* ((i 1 (1+ i))
          (p 0 s)
          (pow-x x (* x pow-x))
          (s x (+ s (* i pow-x))))
         ((or (>= s m)
              (<= (- s p) 1e-12)) s)))
  (do* ((low 0.0d0)
        (high 1.0d0)
        (p 0 x)
        (x 0.5d0 (/ (+ low high) 2))
        (s (u m x) (u m x))
        (diff (abs (- p x)) (abs (- p x))))
       ((<= diff 1e-12) x)
    (if (> s m)
        (setf high x)
        (setf low x))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:solve))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(setq *read-default-float-format* 'double-float)

;; This is an arithmetico-geometric series. The closed form value for it is:
;; x / (1 - x)^2 = m
;; So solving this problem is no harder than solving a quadratic equation.

(defun quadratic-solver (a b c)
  (let* ((discriminant (- (* b b) (* 4 a c)))
         (vertex (- 0 (/ b (* 2 a))))
         (rhe (/ (sqrt discriminant) (* 2 a))))
     (values (- vertex rhe) (+ vertex rhe))))

(defun solve (m)
  (quadratic-solver m (- 0 (* 2 m) 1) m)
)

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:solve))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(setq *read-default-float-format* 'double-float)

(defun solve (m)
  (flet ((solve-quadratic (a b c)
           (let ((u (coerce a 'double-float))
                 (v (coerce b 'double-float))
                 (w (coerce c 'double-float)))
             (let ((d (sqrt (- (* v v) (* 4 u w))))
                   (-b (- 0 v))
                   (2a (* 2 u)))
               (sort (list (/ (+ -b d) 2a) (/ (- -b d) 2a)) #'<)))))
    (destructuring-bind (x y)  (solve-quadratic m (- 0 (1+ (* 2 m))) m)
      (if (and (plusp x) (< x 1)) x y))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:solve))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(setq *read-default-float-format* 'double-float)

(defun solve (m)
  (let ((d (- (expt (/ (1+ (* 2 m)) m) 2) 4)))
    (/ (- (/ (1+ (* 2 m)) m) (sqrt d)) 2)))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution

  (:export #:c))

(defun find-exp (k p)
  (if (= (mod k p) 0)
      (1+ (find-exp (/ k p) p))
      0)
)

(defun factor (k f p acc)
  (if (> (* p p) k)
      (if (> k 1) (funcall f acc p 1) acc)
      (let ((e (find-exp k p)))
           (if (= e 0)
               (factor k f (1+ p) acc)
               (factor (/ k (expt p e)) f (1+ p)
                       (funcall f acc p e)))))
)
      

(defun c (k)
  (factor k (lambda (acc p n)
                    (if (= (mod n 2) 1) 0
                        (* acc (1+ (* 3 (/ n 2))))))
          2 1)
)

(defun count-factor-pairs (n)
  (loop for i from 1 to (isqrt n) by 1
        for (p q) = (multiple-value-list (floor n i)) 
        count (zerop q)
        count (and (zerop q) (not (eq i p)))))

(defun c (k)
  (let ((x (isqrt (* k k k))))
    (if (eql (truncate (* x x)) (truncate (* k k k)))
        (count-factor-pairs (floor x))
        0)))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:c))

(let ((known (make-hash-table)))
  (setf (gethash 1 known) '()
        (gethash 2 known) '(2)
        (gethash 3 known) '(3)
        (gethash 5 known) '(5))
  (macrolet ((try (i &optional (from 5))
               `(multiple-value-bind (q r) (floor n ,i)
                  (when (= 0 r)
                    (return (cons ,i (divs q ,from)))))))
    (defun divs (n &optional (from 5))
      (or (gethash n known)
          (setf (gethash n known)
                (loop :initially (try 2) (try 3)
                      :for i :from from :by 6
                      :while (<= (* i i) n)
                      :do (try i i)
                          (try (+ i 2) i)
                      :finally (return (list n))))))))


(defun c (k)
  (flet ((divs-num (ls)
           (let ((res 1))
             (loop :for (i . pow) :in ls
                   :do (setf res (* res (+ 1 pow))))
             res)))
    (let* ((divs (divs (* k k k)))
           (std-divs (loop :for (i . rest) :on divs
                           :for pow :from 1
                           :when (or (endp rest) (/= i (first rest)))
                             :collect (cons i pow)
                             :and :do (setf pow 0))))
      (if (every (lambda (p) (evenp (cdr p))) std-divs)
          (divs-num (mapcar (lambda (p) (cons (car p) (floor (cdr p) 2))) std-divs))
          0))))

           #:c))

(defun sigma (n)
  (setq kMax (floor (sqrt n)))
  (setf (symbol-function 'f) #'(lambda (k) (if (> k kMax) 0 (if (eq (* k k) n) 1 (if (eq (mod n k) 0) (+ 2 (f (+ k 1))) (f (+ k 1)))))))
  (f 1)
  )

(defun c (k)
  (setq x (floor (sqrt k)))
  (if (eq k (* x x)) (sigma (* x x x)) 0)
)

(defun walk (i n ans cnt m j)
  (cond 
    ((= 1000 j) (* 4 ans))
    ((and (<= n 1) (= 1 m)) ans)
    ((/= 0 (mod n i)) (walk (+ 1 i) n (* ans (+ 1 cnt)) 0 1 (+ 1 j)))
    (t (walk i (floor n i) ans (+ 1 cnt) 0 (+ 1 j)))))

(defun c (k)
  (let ((sq (floor (sqrt k))))
    (if (/= k (* sq sq))
      0
      (walk 2 (* k sq) 1 0 1 0))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:c))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

;;; To solve the problem, find the prime factorization of k^3 , then find a way
;;; to distribute those primes to x and y such that the powers of the primes add up correctly.

(defun eratosieve-primes (n)
  (let ((prime-vector (make-array (1+ n) :initial-element t)))
    (setf (aref prime-vector 0) nil)
    (setf (aref prime-vector 1) nil)
    (let ((upper-limit-candidate-prime (1+ (isqrt n))))
      (do ((current-candidate 2 (1+ current-candidate)))
           ((< upper-limit-candidate-prime current-candidate)
            (loop for i upto n when (aref prime-vector i) collect i))
        (when (aref prime-vector current-candidate)
          (loop for m from (* 2 current-candidate) upto n by current-candidate
                do (setf (aref prime-vector m) nil)))))))



(defvar +primes+ (eratosieve-primes 20000000))



(defun factor-into-prime-power-alist (n)
  (labels ((rec (remaining-prime-factors incomplete-alist remaining-primes)
             (if (= 1 remaining-prime-factors)
                 (nreverse incomplete-alist)
                 (let ((p (car remaining-primes)))
                   (if (zerop (mod remaining-prime-factors p))
                       (let ((pair (cons p (do ((power 1 (1+ power))
                                                (divisor p (* p divisor)))
                                               ((not (zerop (mod remaining-prime-factors divisor))) (1- power))))))
                         (rec (/ remaining-prime-factors (expt (car pair) (cdr pair))) (cons pair incomplete-alist) (cdr remaining-primes)))
                       (rec remaining-prime-factors incomplete-alist (cdr remaining-primes)))))))
    (rec n nil +primes+)))




(defun c (k)
  (let ((prime-decomposition (factor-into-prime-power-alist k)))
    (cond
      ((not (integerp k)) 0)
      ((<= k 0) 0) 
      ((= 1 k) 1)    ; 1 is a special number, it gets its own case.
      ((some #'(lambda (pair) (oddp (cdr pair))) prime-decomposition) 0); If any prime factor in k has an odd power, then no pos int x or y will work.
      (t (apply #'* (loop for pair in prime-decomposition collect (1+ (/ (* 3 (cdr pair)) 2))))))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:c))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun count-divisors (n)
  (loop with upper = (isqrt (1- n))
        with m = (if (= n (expt (1+ upper) 2)) 1 0)
        for k from 1 upto upper
        count (zerop (mod n k)) into divs
        finally (return (+ (* 2 divs) m))))

(defun c (k)
  (let ((sqrt-k (isqrt k)))
    (if (/= k (expt sqrt-k 2))
        0
        (count-divisors (expt sqrt-k 3)))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:c))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun aux (n cnt k)
  (if (< (sqrt n) k)
      (if (= n (* (- k 1)(- k 1)))
          (- cnt 1)
          cnt)
      (if (= 0 (rem n k))
          (aux n (+ 2 cnt) (+ 1 k))
          (aux n cnt (+ 1 k)))))
(defun c (k)
  (let ((r (isqrt k)))
    (if (= k (* r r))
        (aux (* k r) 0 1)
        0)))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:dosteps))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defmacro with_syms ((&rest vars) &body body)
  `(let ,(loop :for name :in vars :collect `(,name (gensym)))
        ,@body))

(defmacro dosteps ((var start end step) &body body)
  (with_syms (start_name end_name step_name)
    `(let ((,start_name ,start) (,end_name ,end) (,step_name ,step))
          (cond 
            ((> ,step_name 0) (loop :for ,var :from ,start_name :below ,end_name :by ,step_name :do ,@body ))
            ((< ,step_name 0) (loop :for ,var :from ,start_name :above ,end_name :by (- ,step_name) :do ,@body))
            (t nil) ) ) ) )

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:dosteps))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defmacro dosteps ((var start end step) &body body)
  `(let ((s ,start) (e ,end) (dd ,step))
    (cond 
      ((< 0 dd) (loop for ,var from s below e by (abs dd) do ,@body))
      ((> 0 dd) (loop for ,var from s above e by (abs dd) do ,@body))
    )
  )
)

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:dosteps))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defmacro dosteps ((var start end step) &body body)
  (let ((b (gensym)) (e (gensym)) (s (gensym)))
    `(let ((,b ,start) (,e ,end) (,s ,step))
      (cond
        ((plusp ,s) (loop for ,var from ,b below ,e by ,s do ,@body))
        ((minusp ,s) (loop for ,var from ,b above ,e by (- ,s) do ,@body))))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:dosteps))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defmacro once-only ((&rest names) &body body)
  (let ((gensyms (loop for n in names collect (gensym))))
    `(let (,@(loop for g in gensyms collect `(,g (gensym))))
      `(let (,,@(loop for g in gensyms for n in names collect ``(,,g ,,n)))
        ,(let (,@(loop for n in names for g in gensyms collect `(,n ,g)))
           ,@body)))))

(defmacro dosteps ((var start end step) &body body)
  (once-only (start end step)
    `
     (if (< ,step 0)
       (do ((,var ,start (+ ,var, step)))
         ((<= ,var ,end))
         ,@body)    
                  
       (when (> ,step 0) (do ((,var ,start (+ ,var ,step)))
           ((>= ,var ,end))
          ,@body)))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:dosteps))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defmacro dosteps ((var start end step) &body body)
  `(let ((s ,start)
	 (e ,end)
	 (st ,step))
     (cond
       ((and (< s e) (> st 0))
	(loop for ,var from s to (1- e) by st
	      do ,@body))
       ((and (> s e) (< st 0))
	(loop for ,var downfrom s to (1+ e) by (- 0 st)
	      do ,@body)))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:dosteps))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defmacro dosteps ((x begin end step) &body body)
  (let ((start (gensym)) (stop (gensym)) (change (gensym)))
    `(do* ((,start ,begin) (,stop ,end) (,change ,step)
           (,x ,start (+ ,x ,change)))
          ((or (= ,change 0)
               (and (> ,change 0) (>= ,x ,stop))
               (and (< ,change 0) (<= ,x ,stop)))
           nil)
       ,@body)))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:burner))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun burner (c h o)
  (let ((water 0) (co2 0) (methane 0))
       (setq water (min (floor h 2) o))
       (setq h (- h (* water 2)))
       (setq o (- o water))
       
       (setq co2 (min (floor o 2) c))
       (setq c (- c co2))
       
       (setq methane (min (floor h 4) c))
       (vector water co2 methane)))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:burner))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun list->vector (list)
  (make-array (length list) :initial-contents list :adjustable nil))

(defun molecules (amounts formula)
  (loop for r in formula
        for m across amounts
        unless (zerop r)
          minimize (floor m r)))

(defun update-amounts (amounts formula mols)
  (loop for r in formula
        for j from 0 below (length amounts)
        do (decf (aref amounts j) (* mols r))))

(defun condense (amounts formulae)
  (mapcar (let ((amounts (list->vector amounts)))
            (lambda (formula)
              (let ((mols (molecules amounts formula)))
                (update-amounts amounts formula mols)
                mols)))
          formulae))

(defun burner (c h o)
  (list->vector (condense (list c h o)
                          '((0 2 1)
                            (1 0 2)
                            (1 4 0)))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:burner))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun burner (c h o)
  (setq h2o (min (floor h 2) o))
  (setq o (- o h2o))
  (setq h (- h (* 2 h2o)))
  
  (setq co2 (min (floor o 2) c))
  (setq c (- c co2))
  (setq o (- o (* 2 co2)))
  
  (setq ch4 (min (floor h 4) c))
  (setq c (- c ch4))
  (setq h (- h (* 4 ch4)))
  
  (vector h2o co2 ch4)
)

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:burner))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun burner (c h o)
  (let ((water (min (floor h 2) o)))
    (setf h (- h (* water 2)))
    (setf o (- o water))
    (let ((co2 (min (floor o 2) c)))
      (setf c (- c co2))
      (setf o (- o (* co2 2)))
      (let ((methane (min c (floor h 4))))
        (vector water co2 methane)))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:burner))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun burner (c h o)
  (let (water co2 methane)
       (setq water (min (floor (/ h 2)) o)
             h (- h (* water 2))
             o (- o water)
             co2 (min c (floor (/ o 2)))
             c (- c co2)
             methane (min c (floor (/ h 4))))
       (vector water co2 methane)))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:burner))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun burner (c h o)
  (let* ((h2 (floor h 2))
         (h2o (min h2 o))
         (h (- h (* 2 h2o)))
         (o (- o h2o))
         (o2 (floor o 2))
         (co2 (min o2 c))
         (o (- o (* 2 co2)))
         (c (- c co2))
         (h4 (floor h 4))
         (ch4 (min h4 c)))
        ;; no need to compute the rest of h and c
   (vector h2o co2 ch4)))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:burner))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun burner (c h o)
  (let* ((water (min (floor h 2) o))
         (co2 (min (floor (- o water) 2) c))
         (methane (min (floor (- h (* 2 water)) 4) (- c co2))))
        (vector water co2 methane)))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:burner))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun n-for-every (n x one)
  "Take n of x for every one of something"
  (abs (min one (floor x n))))

(defun burner (c h o)
  (let* ((water (n-for-every 2 h o))                            ;; 2 of h             for every o
         (diox  (n-for-every 2 (- o water) c))                  ;; 2 of o             for every c after water
         (meth  (n-for-every 4 (- h (* 2 water)) (- c diox))))  ;; 4 of h after water for every c after diox
        (vector water diox meth)))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:burner))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun n-for-every (n x one)
  "Take n of x for every one of something"
  (abs (min one (floor x n))))

(defun burner (c h o)
  (let* ((water (n-for-every 2 h o))                            ;; take 2 of h for every o
         (diox  (n-for-every 2 (- o water) c))                  ;; take 2 of o for ever c after water
         (meth  (n-for-every 4 (- h (* 2 water)) (- c diox))))  ;; take 4 of h after water for ever c after diox
        (vector water diox meth)))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:burner))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun f (step many one &optional (tot 0))
  "step through many for every one of something"
  (if (or (= 0 one) (> step many)) 
      tot 
      (f step (- many step) (1- one) (1+ tot))))

(defun burner (c h o)
  (let* ((water (f 2 h o))                           ;; 2 h for every o
         (diox  (f 2 (- o water) c))                 ;; 2 o for ever c after water
         (meth  (f 4 (- h (* 2 water)) (- c diox)))) ;; 4 h for every c after water after diox
     (vector water diox meth)))

(defun f (x y z) 
  (let* ((naive-lines (* x y z 12))
         (xy-lines (+ (* (+ x 1) y) (* (+ y 1) x)))
         (xz-lines (+ (* (+ x 1) z) (* (+ z 1) x)))
         (yz-lines (+ (* (+ y 1) z) (* (+ z 1) y)))
         (surface-lines-edges (* 4 (+ x y z)))
         (surface-lines (- (* 2 (+ xy-lines xz-lines yz-lines)) surface-lines-edges))
         (surface-lines-not-edges (- surface-lines surface-lines-edges))
         (naive-surface-lines (+ surface-lines-edges (* 2 surface-lines-not-edges)))
         (naive-inside-lines (- naive-lines naive-surface-lines))
         (inside-lines (/ naive-inside-lines 4))
         (lines (+ surface-lines inside-lines)))
    lines))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:f))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun f (x y z) 
  (cond
    ((and (zerop x)
	  (zerop y)) z)
    ((and (zerop x)
	  (zerop z)) y)
    ((and (zerop y)
	  (zerop z)) x)
    ((zerop x) (+ (* (1+ y) z)
		  (* (1+ z) y)))
    ((zerop y) (+ (* (1+ x) z)
		  (* (1+ z) x)))
    ((zerop z) (+ (* (1+ y) x)
		  (* (1+ x) y)))
    (t (+ (* (1+ z)
	     (f x y 0))
	  (* z (1+ x) (1+ y))))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:dont-give-me-five))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun aux (n p r)
  (if (<= n 0) r
    (let ((d (mod n 10)) (m (floor n 10)))
      (if (= d 5) (aux m (* p 9) (+ (* p 4) p -1))
                  (aux m (* p 9) (+ r (* p (if (> d 5) (- d 1) d))))
       ))))

(defun no-fives (n) (aux n 1 0))

(defun dont-give-me-five (start end)
  (cond ((> start 0) (- (no-fives end) (no-fives (- start 1))))
        ((< end 0)   (- (no-fives (- start)) (no-fives (- -1 end))))
        (t           (+ (no-fives end) (no-fives (- start)) 1))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:dont-give-me-five))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun leading-digit-factor (x)
  (when (and (<= 0 x) (< x 10))
    (cond ((zerop x) 0)
	        ((<= x 5) x)
	        (t (1- x)))))

(defun digit-5-p (n)
  (if (= n 5)
      0
      1))

(defun number-to-list (n)
  (map 'list #'digit-char-p (prin1-to-string (abs n))))

(defun lst-has-no-5-p (lst)
  (if (find 5 lst)
      0
      1))

(defun no-range-no-five (lst)
  (if lst
      (+ (* (leading-digit-factor (car lst)) (expt 9 (length (cdr lst))))
	       (* (digit-5-p (car lst)) (no-range-no-five (cdr lst))))
      0))

(defun dont-give-me-five (start end)
  (let ((start-lst (number-to-list start))
	      (end-lst (number-to-list end)))
    (+ (-  (* (signum end) (no-range-no-five end-lst) )
	   (* (signum start) (no-range-no-five start-lst)))
	     (cond ((<= 0 start end) (lst-has-no-5-p end-lst))
		         ((<= start 0 end) (1- (+ (lst-has-no-5-p start-lst)
					                            (lst-has-no-5-p end-lst))))
		         ((<= start end 0) (lst-has-no-5-p start-lst))
		         (t 0)))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:dont-give-me-five))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun dont-give-me-five (start end)
  (let ((start-digits (map 'list (lambda (x) (parse-integer (string x)))
			   (write-to-string (abs start))))
	(end-digits (map 'list (lambda (x) (parse-integer (string x)))
			 (write-to-string (abs end)))))
    (cond
      ((and (> start 0)
	    (> end 0))
       (1+ (- (choices (get-close-normal end-digits 'd))
	      (choices (get-close-normal start-digits 'u)))))
      ((and (< start 0)
	    (< end 0))
       (dont-give-me-five (- end) (- start)))
      (t (1- (+ (choices (get-close-normal start-digits 'd))
		(choices (get-close-normal end-digits 'd))))))))
      

(defun choices (digits)
  (cond
    ((and (null (rest digits))
	  (>= (car digits) 5)) (car digits))
    ((and (null (rest digits))
	  (< (car digits) 5)) (1+ (car digits)))
      ((= 5 (car digits)) (* 5 (expt 9 (1- (length digits)))))
      ((> 5 (car digits)) (+ (* (car digits) (expt 9 (1- (length digits))))
			     (choices (rest digits))))
      ((< 5 (car digits)) (+ (* (1- (car digits)) (expt 9 (1- (length digits))))
			     (choices (rest digits))))))
	     
(defun get-close-normal (digits f)
  (cond
    ((null digits) ())
    ((and (eq f 'd) (= 5 (car digits))) (cons 4 (loop for x from 1 to (1- (length digits))
				      collect 9)))
    ((and (eq f 'u) (= 5 (car digits))) (cons 6 (loop for x from 1 to (1- (length digits))
						      collect 0)))
    (t (cons (car digits)
	     (get-close-normal (rest digits) f)))))

(defpackage #:challenge/solution
  (:use #:cl)
  (:export #:dont-give-me-five))
(in-package #:challenge/solution)

(defun contained-fives (n &optional (p 1) (fives-below-p 0) (rest-of-n 0) (fives 0))
  (setq d (mod n 10))
  (cond
    ((= n 0) fives)
    ((< n 0) (contained-fives (- n)))
    ((< d 5) (contained-fives (floor n 10) (* p 10) (+ (* 9 fives-below-p) p) (+ rest-of-n (* d p)) (+ fives (* d fives-below-p))))
    ((> d 5) (contained-fives (floor n 10) (* p 10) (+ (* 9 fives-below-p) p) (+ rest-of-n (* d p)) (+ fives (* (1- d) fives-below-p) p)))
    ((= d 5) (contained-fives (floor n 10) (* p 10) (+ (* 9 fives-below-p) p) (+ rest-of-n (* d p)) (+ rest-of-n (* 5 fives-below-p) 1)))
    )
)

(defun dont-give-me-five (start end)
  (if (>= start 0)
      (setq fstart (contained-fives (1- start)))
      (setq fstart (- (contained-fives (- start)))))
  (if (>= end 0)
      (setq fend (contained-fives end))
      (setq fend (- (contained-fives (- -1 end)))))
  (+ end (- start) 1 (- fend) fstart)
)
